about_the_game:
This is a huge expansion pack that adds a ton of content to our passion project for the homeless.

It includes loads of new elements in the streets, more perks, more items, more NPCs, new challenge modes and a huge character creation system. The city just became more alive...

NEW BUILDINGS

New buildings have been added, giving the streets more depth and things to do as well as new pathways to completing a run


NEW CHARACTER CREATOR SYSTEM

Create your own character and customise your run options with our new customisation feature!




Adjust your starting perks, maladies, items and some new unique traits to customise your playthrough... As well as from a whole bunch of new unlockables depending on your overall progress within the game!

(NOTE: Full disclosure, this is not a full graphical character customisation feature, in that it doesn't allow you to change different small parts of your character's visuals, it is more about the customisable gameplay and story aspects.)

EXPANDED STREETS

  • New street vendors have arrived!
  • New vending machine types!
  • Get a busking license and bring music to the subway
  • Search various new objects and interactable things in the street, including recycling bins and more...

NEW ITEMS & PERKS!


  • A massive 64 new perks!
  • 16 new items, a mix of food, utility and special permanent items that can be unlocked by progressing through the additional player levels added in the exp system.

NEW CHARACTERS!


Many, many new characters have been added to the streets, each with unique interactions or trading options. Includes several new homeless characters, a few new pedestrians and a few other new NPCs.

NEW CHALLENGE MODES!


Several new challenge modes are included for experienced players! Can you escape the homeless life in a pandemic or in extreme weather conditions? New unlocks in the character customizer await if you can...

LO FI SOUNDTRACK!

By popular demand, a more chill, lo-fi remix of almost the entire soundtrack is included that can be toggled in the options menu, for those who wish to play with a less emotional overtone.


If you thought CHANGE had a lot of depth before, this will be a treat. And of course, we will continue to support homeless charities with the proceeds from this DLC as we do with the base game.

Welcome to The Living City.
